content: Excellent participation in class discussions. Shows strong analytical thinking skills.
Completed extra credit assignment on time. Very organized student.
Outstanding performance in math competitions. Natural problem solver.
Could improve on time management for assignments. Tends to procrastinate.
Great leadership skills shown during group projects. Helps other students.
Missed assignment due to illness. Will need to make up work.
Excellent sportsmanship in PE class. Team player attitude.
Shows artistic talent in creative assignments. Very imaginative.
Exceptional work in science fair project. Shows real passion for research.
Strong debate skills. Very articulate and well-prepared for discussions.
